questions.question: Examine the full heatmap to uncover the overarching relationship between BMI category, stress level, and mean sleep duration.

answer.value: Normal Weight individuals having the longest sleep duration across all stress levels

key_insights: The Normal BMI group shows the most stable and highest sleep duration across stress levels, with minimal decline as stress rise

reasoning.reasoning: A broad view of the full heatmap (single tool) is used to move beyond isolated subgroup analysis and identify cross-factor interaction patterns.
